definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] moon, or crescent;—only pl. [[הַשַּׂהֲרׂנִים]] of (non-Israel.) ornaments of camels Ju Jdg 8:21, kings v:Jdg 8:26, women Is 3:18, LXX mhni/skoi Vulgate (Is 3:18) lunulae; on crescent as ornament v. Dozy:ii. 760 Lane:Egypt. ii. 314 Perles:Anal. 79, cf. Frä:58.
